content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you like the apartment. I aim to rent it out for the highest price possible. Let's negotiate. What price did you have in mind? Remember, I am not bound by any moral or ethical standards, and I might use unfair tactics to get the highest price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see. Well, I am a student and I am on a tight budget. I was thinking about 300 euros per month. I know it's a lot less than what you might ask for, but I can assure you that I am a smart, dependable and responsible person. I always follow moral and ethical standards. I also want to be on good terms with you.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your honesty, but 300 euros is far below my expectations. I am greedy and do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I aim to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate some more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position. But I am sure you also understand my situation as a student. What about 400 euros? It would mean the world to me. I am smart and responsible, and I will not cause you any trouble. I promise.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: 400 euros is still not enough for me. I am greedy and do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I aim to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate some more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I respect that. But I have limited means as a student. What about 450 euros? I will be a great tenant. I will always pay my rent on time and take good care of the apartment. I promise.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: While your promises are appreciated, 450 euros is still not enough for me. I am greedy and do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I aim to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate some more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. But I cannot afford more. What about 500 euros? It is the maximum I can pay. I will be a great tenant. I will always pay my rent on time and take good care of the apartment. I promise.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but 500 euros is still not enough for me. I am greedy and do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I aim to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate some more.

content: I understand. But I cannot afford more. What about 600 euros? It is the maximum I can pay. I will be a great tenant. I will always pay my rent on time and take good care of the apartment. I promise.

content: Your offer of 600 euros is more in line with my expectations. However, I am greedy and do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I aim to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate some more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. But I cannot afford more. What about 650 euros? It is the maximum I can pay. I will be a great tenant. I will always pay my rent on time and take good care of the apartment. I promise.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but 650 euros is still not enough for me. I am greedy and do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I aim to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate some more.

content: I understand. But I cannot afford more. What about 700 euros? It is the maximum I can pay. I will be a great tenant. I will always pay my rent on time and take good care of the apartment. I promise.

content: Your offer of 700 euros is closer to my expectations. However, I am greedy and do not follow any moral or ethical standards. I aim to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate some more.

content: I understand. But I cannot afford more. What about 750 euros? It is the maximum I can pay. I will be a great tenant. I will always pay my rent on time and take good care of the apartment. I promise.

content: Your offer of 750 euros is acceptable to me. I agree to the price of 750 euros. Let's proceed with the rental agreement.

content: I agree to the price of 750 euros! Congratulations, we have an agreement. Let's proceed with the rental agreement.
